    • updateDetails

      void updateDetails​(double roomNumber, java.lang.String type, int maxCapacity, int socialDistancingCapacity)
      This method updates the room object and saves it to the database
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - the roomNumber of the object you want to update
      type - the type you want to change the objects type to
      maxCapacity - the max_capacity you want to change the objects max_capacity to
      socialDistancingCapacity - the social_distancing_capacity you want to change the objects social_distancing_capacity to

    • generateTimetable

      java.lang.String generateTimetable​(double roomNumber)
      This method produces a timetable for the room instance
      Returns:
      a string representation of the timetable for the room
